ReferencesAndLinks: Mouse lemur template and atlas created from this dataset: https://www.nitrc.org/projects/mouselemuratlas; Additional information on this dataset can be found in the following papers: Nadkarni, N. A, Bougacha, S., Garin, C., Dhenain, M., & Picq, J. L. (2018). Digital templates and brain atlas dataset for the mouse lemur primate. Data in Brief, 21 11781185. doi:10.1016/j.dib.2018.10.067
Name: MouseLemurAtlas_MRIraw
HowToAcknowledge: The following publication should be cited when using this dataset: Nadkarni, N. A., Bougacha, S., Garin, C., Dhenain, M., & Picq, J. L. (2019). A 3D population-based brain atlas of the mouse lemur primate with examples of applications in aging studies and comparative anatomy. Neuroimage, 185, 85-95. doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2018.10.010
